title: Because of Your Words
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Chika-chan, Maru brought the book you asked for zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Waah! You came all the way here to give it to me!? I was gonna get it myself though~! Sorry, it must’ve been heavy right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Nope! It’s one of Maru’s beloved books, so it’s not heavy at all. More importantly, is the one Maru picked fine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>If you picked it, then there’s no doubt about it, Hanamaru-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Umm, this book is set in a medieval castle zura. Maru was able to imagine many things from reading this book. A pure white castle perched on a cliff overlooking a lake…. At the top of the tower is a princess with amber hair and sapphire eyes….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ah, sorry! Maru didn’t mean to…. Chika-chan….? What’s the matter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Reading the book is great and all, but I feel like I can think of better lyrics with your story instead, Hanamaru-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Just now, when listening to you rambling about the book, images of the lyrics came rushing in….! Hanamaru-chan, tell me more!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>If you say it like that, it puts a lot of pressure on Maru to think of what would be good to say zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
